::Shadow Wing::

She slowly got up and hobbled up to the doorway of the bridge. She 
saw that the bridge was now completely destroyed.  Beams were fallen 
all around, metal and computer parts were scattered about. Part of 
the autocontrol panel was melted.  She sighed. "And I just got done 
fixing some of that."  She sank to her knees and looked at the 
remains of bridge.  She looked at her legs and noticed she had cuts 
all over her body. She jsut ignored it.  She was now to depressed to 
worry about herself.  She knew that was no longer any hope for the 
ship.  It was already falling apart and now..this. She moved back 
just in time as a huge beam came crashing down in front of her.  She 
turned and walked back down the hall towards the entrance.  She was 
starting to get really mad. She went from a walk to a dead run for 
the ship entrance.
